instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: the efficient tool used to remove rivets on the retina keyboards?
threads.message: when it comes down to retina keyboards replacement, it's pretty much time wasting for me. have to correct those rivet after pulling out the keyboard one by one,some can't be taken out, so after keyboard installation I just glue those rivets together with the keyboard holes. what tool you guys use to remove the rivets? or any easy ways to replace the keyboard fast?

threads.title: the efficient tool used to remove rivets on the retina keyboards?
threads.message: It helps if you actually read everything that is posted here, you are paying for it. This topic is discussed in the Tools section.
